name: Rushi Reddy Lambu
label: ML and Data Professional
summary: I am an ML enthusiast pursuing my master's in Computer and Information Science and graduating in Spring 2025. Previously, I worked as a Software Engineer at Capgemini Technology Services India Limited. My interests include drawing and writing short stories.

work_experience.summary: As a backend developer, I focus on building and optimizing backend services and microservices using Java, Spring Boot, Docker, Kubernetes, OAuth, and AWS Cloud.
highlights: Developed microservices architecture with Java, Spring Boot, and AWS Cloud
Built and deployed RESTful APIs for seamless backend integration and automated processes via CI/CD with Prometheus and Grafana

projects.title: GitHub-bugs-prediction-using-RNN-LSTM-BERT-and-MLP-models
projects.summary: Developed a pipeline to classify GitHub issues into bugs, features, and questions using deep learning
highlights: Preprocessed 150,000 issues with title and body data, balancing classes and vectorizing text with TF-IDF.
Trained various models, including RNN, LSTM, BERT, and MLP achieving the highest accuracy of 69% with the MLP model.
Automated issue categorization, reducing manual effort and improving scalability

images.caption: 150,000 issues with title and body data

projects.title: Data-Driven-Healthcare-Analytics-using-Tableau
projects.summary: Developed data visualization dashboards to analyze healthcare trends, focusing on patient demographics, risk factors, and treatment outcomes.
highlights: Conducted strategic analysis of healthcare data for data-driven policy decisions.
Identified patterns in heart disease prevalence, supporting targeted healthcare strategies. Used interactive data storytelling to present complex medical insights intuitively.
Applied trend analysis to assess long-term healthcare patterns and guide strategic planning

volunteer_experience.summary: As a student volunteer I made sure that each student project is presented at the scheduled time
highlights: I made sure that each student project is presented at the scheduled time

volunteer_experience.summary: I was the publicity volunteer for the Robovedha 2018 robotics event conducted by The Robotics Club
highlights: Went to every college in near by to inform everyone about the event.

degrees: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
